There aren’t general recommendations for sizes / aspect ratios for theme, section, and template previews, are there? I don’t see anything in the docs/guidelines and In the CMS boilerplate, you’re using various sizes and aspect ratios for the different template and section screenshots. From what I see, it looks like full-website previews are probably best for the theme and template previews, and sections seem to pretty much depend on the size of the section.

Away from my computer in a car at the moment, so I'm going off memory. I don't recall if we have specific guidelines for template screenshots. I'm pretty sure theres no required specific dimensions for marketplace. The important part is that the image used helps differentiate one template from another.  They are used primarily for template selection and section selection in the UI.

Section templates - my recommendation is to use the chrome inspectors node screenshot tool to capture just the section itself regardless of size. (If you use chrome, obviously use the equivalent feature for your browser of choice.)

The screenshots should be taken on desktop.

Is there a way to change the default margins that are added to new sections in the content editor experience for hubl themes? There's a default of 18 px, and I'm wondering at this point if I should just give my header and footer an 18 px margin to match =/
